executable-in-python_key1: Aap `python` ka use kar kar bhi ek execu`tab`le program bana sakte ho. Uske liye, aapko
executable-in-python_key2: line ko apni `file` mei sabse pehli line mei daalna hoga.
executable-in-python_key3: Ek example ke through dekhte hai.
executable-in-python_key4: Ab iss `file` ko apni pasand ke `editor` se khol kar, kuch content daalte hai
executable-in-python_key5: Ab aap iss program ko `execute` karne ki permissions de
executable-in-python_key6: Ab iss program ko aap, `/usr/bin` directory mei move kar de. Yaha move karne se, yeh program kahi se bhi aap `execute` kar payenge.
executable-in-python_key7: Ab aap apne program ko `execute` kar sakte ho
executable-in-python_key8: Aap apna program kahi se bhi `execute` kar paoge.
